version_description:
Complete Interface and Under the Hood Redesign for ease of use!

Introduction of new features such as:

- Undo, Multiple Layers, new units, new Interface and editing modes, ability to save measurements for future reference!

Thanks for the feedback! In this version we have added:

+ Total perimeter measurement;
+ Fixed a bug where the last segment was not showing its perimeter value;

Additionally we have added general performance improvements!

Thanks!
New settings page! Optimised under the hood components for a smoother sailing :)

New Premium Feature!

You can now share your measurement publicly with friends, co-workers or clients on a dedicated URL.

Thanks and let us know if/how you like our app to be improved!

New public sharing feature added to the Premium Settings tab!

General improvements and typo fixes!

This version brings new performance improvements as well as bug fixes!

Thanks for the continued use and support of our app!

New design for shared measurements online (thanks to our users for suggesting new features and improvements!)

Under the hood changes to improve performance.

Cheers!
